mapper.insert: insert into comment(rNum, mNum, cContent, parentCNum) values(#{rNum},#{mNum},#{cContent},#{parentCNum})
mapper.select: select c.cNum as cNum, c.rNum as rNum ,c.mNum as mNum, m.mId as mId, c.cContent as cContent, c.cCreate as cCreate, c.parentCNum as parentCNum from comment c join member m on c.mNum = m.mNum where c.rNum = #{rNum} order by c.parentCNum asc, c.cCreate asc
mapper.delete: delete from comment where cNum = #{cNum} or parentCNum = #{cNum}
